data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Khartoum, Sudan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khartoum, Sudan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Khartoum, Sudan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 7,124,418 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Khartoum to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Khartoum to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Deaf people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord we pray you unite the 27,683 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Khartoum.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 27,683 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khartoum, Sudan has a population of 7,152,100.

We estimate Khartoum has 27,683 people who might know Jesus, 328,864 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,795,554 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Khartoum, Sudan.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
